Package com.im.njams.sdk.communication.kafka

Class CommandsConsumer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.im.njams.sdk.communication.kafka.CommandsConsumer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable
    public class CommandsConsumer
extends Thread
    A thread for a KafkaConsumer, that constantly needs to check if there are new commands in its Kafka topic
    Version:
    4.2.0-SNAPSHOT
    Author:
    sfaiz

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommandsConsumer

        protected CommandsConsumer​(Properties properties,
                           String topic,
                           String clientId,
                           KafkaReceiver receiver)
        This constructor saves the given properties and creates a KafkaConsumer
        Parameters:
        properties - the nJAMS properties that are used for connecting
        topic - topic to subscribe to
        clientId - The client id to be used for the consumer
        receiver - the KafkaReceiver that uses this consumer instance
